statements: DELETE FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale' AND sales_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM social_media_sales_data WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale' AND campaign_start_date = '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM social_media_data WHERE id = 101 AND post_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount < 500.00 AND sales_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM social_media_data WHERE post_author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM social_media_data WHERE post_author = 'John Doe' AND post_likes < 10;
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 100000 AND clicks < 5000;
DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
